#include <iostream>
using namespce std;

int max(int x,int y)
{
     int z;
     if (x > y) z = x;
     else z = y;
     return z;
}

int main()
{
     int a,b,m;
     cin >> a >> b;
     m = max(a,b);
     cout << "max=" <<m << '\n';
     return 0;
}

#include <iostream>

// å£°æ˜ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ï¼Œç±»åä¸ºStudent
class Student
{ 
      private:
           int num,score;
      public:
           void setdata()
           {
               cin >> num >> score;
           }
           void display()
           {
               cout << "num=" << num <<endl;
               cout << "score=" << score << endl;
           } 
};

// å®šä¹‰ç±»ç±»å‹çš„å˜é‡(å¯¹è±¡)

{

    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char c1='C',c2='+',c3='+';
    cout << "12345678123";
    cout << "4567812345678" << "He says: \"C++ is very interesting!\"" << '\n';
    cout << "I say: \"" << c1 << c2 << c3 << "\"";
    cout << "\t\t" << "He says: \"C++ is very interesting!\"" << '\n';
    return 0;
}
